customer_reviews.title: WOW! WOW!! WOOOOOOW!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product to anyone who suffers from SEVERE constipation, be it of natural causes or medical causes. I was drinking tea every night and dreaded the process till I just randomly decided to try Phillip milk of magnesia tablet on Amazon knowing that almost everything is sold on Amazon......and vuala it popped up. customer_reviews.title: great for regularity

customer_reviews.author: Tom's Picks

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for me
customer_reviews.text: Docusate sodium (stool softener) morning and night didn't help me but adding just one Phillip's Caplet at bedtime did the trick. Now, I go every morning like clockwork ;-). Stick with Phillip's or other name brand products. My gastroenterologist told me to get Phillip's Caplets because store-brand magnesium oxide supplements can be contaminated with toxic heavy metals. I googled the topic and confirmed that he was right. Be sure that the main ingredient is "magnesium oxide" because other magnesium compounds don't have the same effect.

customer_reviews.title: Saved my sanity
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from severe constipation since I was a young child. For years, a few tablespoons of mineral oil did the trick, so I was terrified when that suddenly stopped working for me last year. Now I take 2-3 of these caplets every night and have regained my peace of mind and ability to eat normally. They work quickly overnight and allow me to go normally in the morning without any crisis or unpredictability. The only negative is that you have to take them with at least a 12oz drink, so it's best to take them after dinner but at least an hour or two before going to bed.
